thread.section_title: Discover More in War on Flipboard
thread.title: Hamas accepts ceasefire proposal | Flipboard

author: KDFW
title: Hamas accepts ceasefire proposal | Flipboard
text: The Hamas militant group said Monday it has accepted an Egyptian-Qatari ceasefire proposal to halt the seven-month war with Israel.
